find_package(Matlab REQUIRED)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${MATLAB_INCLUDE_DIRS})

SET (module gvxrMatlab)


configure_file(../gvxrWrapper-doc.in ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/gvxrMatlab.i)
SET_PROPERTY(SOURCE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/gvxrMatlab.i PROPERTY CPLUSPLUS ON)

# Add swig module
IF(${CMAKE_VERSION} VERSION_LESS "3.8.0")
    SWIG_ADD_MODULE(${module} matlab ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${module}.i)
ELSE (${CMAKE_VERSION} VERSION_LESS "3.8.0")
    SWIG_ADD_LIBRARY(${module} LANGUAGE matlab SOURCES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${module}.i)
ENDIF (${CMAKE_VERSION} VERSION_LESS "3.8.0")

set_property(
    SOURCE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${module}.i
    PROPERTY SWIG_MODULE_NAME ${module})

swig_link_libraries(${module} ${SimpleGVXR_LIBRARY} ${SimpleGVXR_LIBRARIES} ${MATLAB_LIBRARIES})

configure_file(test.m.in ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/test.m)
FILE(COPY ../welsh-dragon-small.stl DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
FILE(COPY runMatlabTest.sh
		DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}
		FILE_PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ
  			GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)

install(FILES
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/test.m
    DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${INSTALL_DIR}/matlab
    COMPONENT Demos)

IF (UNIX)
    install(FILES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${module}.oct
        DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${INSTALL_DIR}/matlab
        PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE
        COMPONENT "GNU Matlab")

    install(FILES
    	  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/runMatlabTest.sh
        DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${INSTALL_DIR}/matlab
        PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE
        COMPONENT Demos)
ENDIF (UNIX)

SET (CPACK_COMPONENTS_ALL ${CPACK_COMPONENTS_ALL}  "GNU Matlab" PARENT_SCOPE)
